name: East Midlands Rover (3 in 7 days or 7 days)
description:
EAST MIDLANDS ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for either any 3 days in 7 days or 7 consecutive days. The area extends from New Mills Central, Stoke-on-Trent and Stafford in the west to Cleethorpes and Skegness in the east and from Doncaster in the 
      north to Bletchley in the south and encompasses Sheffield, Derby, Nottingham, Coventry, Rugby, Leicester and Peterborough. The East Midlands Rover is now available to buy online

fares_and_restrictions.raw:
fares & restrictions New fares 8th June 2025 Any 3 days in 7 adult: £116.10 child (5-15): £58.05 16-17 saver: £58.05 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £77.30 FF H V child fare: £22.00 7 consecutive days adult: £151.10 child (5-15): £75.55 16-17 saver: £75.55 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £100.60 FF H V child fare: £28.70 Railcards ⯈ Railcards: 16 = 16-25 26 = 26-30 SE = Senior DI = Disabled 2T = Two Together FF = Family & Friends H = HM Forces V = Veterans Previous fares ⯈ Previous fares (adult) 3 in 7 days: 2024 - £111.00 2023 - £105.80 2022 - £99.90 2021 - £93.80 2020 - £93.80 2019 - £91.20 2018 - £88.40 2014 - £80.90 2011 - £71.00 7 days: 2024 - £.144.50 2023 - £137.70 2022 - £130.00 2021 - £122.00 2020 - £122.00 2019 - £118.70 2018 - £115.00 2014 - £105.20 2011 - £87.40 time restrictions Mon to Fri: valid from 09:00 but 2T railcard not valid until 09:30 No restrictions at weekends or public holidays route restrictions Not valid via Birmingham NS train operating companies Avanti West Coast, CrossCountry, East Midlands Railway, Hull Trains, London North Eastern Railway, London Northwestern Railway, Northern, TransPennine Express, West Midlands Railway purchasing ONLINE : ✔ Train conductor: ✔ * Station ticket office: ✔ Ticket Vending Machine: ✔ i Northern Ticket Vending Machines now sell most ranger and rover tickets but at the moment only for same-day travel (rather prohibitive for distant areas) Some Avanti West Coast station TVMs for example Crewe, now sell local rangers and rovers. LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them.
      A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities

stations: Elton & Orston Fenny Stratford Gainsborough Central
